root: ^Matt? It's been a while... - She looks you up and down and seems unphased by your state -

NotMuchChanged: ^Sorry, I don't know what I was expecting...
^I guess I had just hoped that you would've tried to make a difference in your life.
^I'm so sorry about what happened at that time. If I could go back and change the past, I would
^I've been trying, I want to fix what happened
CantGoBackInTime: ^That's a nice sentiment but you know full well that's not possible.
^Look, if anything I'd rather you try to take control of your future so can stop living in the past making the same mistakes over and over again.
^I have been trying to become better...Really...
GoodButDoesntChangeThings: ^It doesn't just take one good action, you need to keep maintaining these changes. Things between us will never be the same as it used to.
^I want you to learn to move on without me, that's the only way you can make your life change for the better.
HopefullyNextTime: ^I hope the next time we meet, things will have turned around for the better for the both of us...
DontWantToHearIt: ^I'm so sorry, I never meant to hurt you...
IKnowButYouDid: ^But you did...and nothing will change that.
^I don't want you to try to fix the past, I want you to make sure you can have your own future by moving on and by continuing to make changes in your life for the better.
AskAsFriend: ^I'm asking you as a friend. Please keep trying to move on until you're finally free from everything.
WentBetterThanExpected: ^That seemed to have gone better than what I was expecting...
^Well anyway, it's getting pretty late, we should head off.
CarNotFar: ^Come'on, the car's not too far away.
